description: A GRANT statement gives table read access to the wrong group. Fix the principal so SELECT on federal_data.citizen_records.records is granted to auditors_group.
starterCode: GRANT SELECT ON TABLE federal_data.citizen_records.records TO interns_group;
simulatedOutput: Issue: Audit team cannot query required records for compliance review.
hints: Only the target principal is incorrect.
Use the compliance-focused group name auditors_group.
